mapper.select: SELECT a.cmSeq ,a.cmName FROM customer AS a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.cmDelNy = 0 ORDER BY a.cmSeq DESC
SELECT a.inspSeq ,a.inspName FROM insProduct AS a WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.inspDelNy = 0 ORDER BY a.inspSeq DESC

SELECT aa.* FROM( SELECT a.inscSeq ,a.inscDateStart ,a.inscDateEnd ,a.inscStatus ,a.inscBigo ,a.inscDelNy ,a.inscDateTimeReg ,a.inscDateTimeEdit ,a.insProduct_inspSeq ,a.customer_cmSeq ,b.inspName ,c.cmName
ORDER BY a.inscSeq DESC ) aa limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}

SELECT a.inscSeq ,a.inscDateStart ,a.inscDateEnd ,a.inscStatus ,a.inscBigo ,a.inscDelNy ,a.inscDateTimeReg ,a.inscDateTimeEdit ,a.insProduct_inspSeq ,a.customer_cmSeq ,b.inspName ,c.cmName FROM insContract AS a LEFT JOIN insProduct AS b ON b.inspSeq = a.insProduct_inspSeq LEFT JOIN customer AS c ON c.cmSeq = a.customer_cmSeq WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.inscSeq = #{inscSeq}
mapper.update: UPDATE insContract SET inscDelNy = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 AND inscSeq = #{inscSeq}
